package.description: race_tachometer calculates a speed and collect global distance, avarage speed, maximal speed, motion time and global running time of the pr2. The path to the output file can be parametrized via launch file, at the the the frequency is 1 Hz (c++ file, don't forgett to compile afterwards). The data are written back after the program received a SIGINT.
package.author: Denis Klimentjew
